price: Kuma rãnar da azzãlumi yake cĩzo a kan hannayensa, yanã cẽwa "Ya kaitõna! (A ce dai) na riƙi hanya tãre da Manzo!
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ يَعَضُّ ٱلظَّالِمُ عَلَىٰ يَدَيۡهِ يَقُولُ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي ٱتَّخَذۡتُ مَعَ ٱلرَّسُولِ سَبِيلٗا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wayawma yaʿaḍḍu al-ẓālimu ʿalā yadayhi yaqūlu yālaytanī ittakhadhtu maʿa al-rasūli sabīlan
